spec_data.Name: perl-Time-Duration-Parse
spec_data.Description:
Time::Duration::Parse is a module to parse human readable duration strings
like "2 minutes and 3 seconds" to seconds. It does the opposite of
duration_exact() in Time::Duration and is roundtrip safe.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:39:47 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Parse string that represents time duration
